类型: BUG状态:开放解析：目前未无法解决版本 Minecraft 15w33c, Minecraft 15w34a, (2)
Minecraft 15w34b, Minecraft 15w35b 或者更多有没有在哪一个版本修复？ 无安全级别: 非常安全，每个人都可以(没有致命到马上出另一个版本)标签 无官方确认了么？已经确认


解释这个BUG是如何产生的？
When shields have no pattern(s) applied, they use the damage value to determine color instead of the Base field in BlockEntityTag. This field is also used to track the durability of the shield, which has two effects:
Changing the durability of the shield (by taking damage or repairing it) changes the colorCrafting a new shield creates one that has lost 0 to 15 points of durability
A simple fix would be to always add the BlockEntityTag when crafting a new shield and always set the damage value to 0, and for shields withoutBlockEntityTag (e.g. obtained through /give), to always display their color as black.
